rooms.title: Crackle Workshop
rooms.description: Benches, tools, and half-built contraptions hum with patient possibility. Overhead pulleys shuttle trays of glowing components while chalk-sketched diagrams redraw themselves whenever a better idea sparks.

items.name: Clockwork Beetle
items.description: Tiny gears whir as it folds into a pocket-sized multitool.

items.name: Soldering Wand
items.description: Its tip glows when it senses an unfinished invention.

items.name: Schematic Slate
items.description: Sketch an idea and the slate projects a three-dimensional preview above the table.

npcs.name: Foreman Rel
npcs.auto_greet: Bring me a problem and I'll loan you the right solution, or at least the right wrench.

rooms.title: Gearworks Atrium
rooms.description: Floor-to-ceiling cogs lazily rotate in polite applause for every tinkerer who passes by. Copper pistons keep time with a steady beat that syncs the entire complex.

items.name: Calibration Cog
items.description: A palm-sized cog that adjusts itself to mesh with any gear you press it against.

rooms.title: Gearworks Mezzanine
rooms.description: A suspended balcony offers a bird's-eye view of the atrium. Suspended gauges track tension in every chain, whispering warnings before jams can occur.

items.name: Overseer Lens
items.description: Looking through the lens highlights any component overdue for maintenance.

rooms.title: Calibration Bridge
rooms.description: A narrow catwalk spans the open air between the workshop tower and the market clocktower. Resonant tuning forks hang from the railings, singing whenever the bridge detects misaligned gears nearby.

items.name: Balancing Harness
items.description: Strap it on to steady your footing while you work above the spinning gears.

rooms.title: Cogspring Well
rooms.description: A vertical fountain of gears trickles oil like water, powering hidden machines below. Steam wisps carry the scent of ozone and hot iron.

items.name: Oilweave Cloth
items.description: Wipe down any mechanism and the cloth records its last calibration settings.

rooms.title: Resonant Press
rooms.description: Massive plates thrum with harmonic energy, imprinting circuits into clay with perfect precision. Each press stroke leaves a faint chord hanging in the air.

items.name: Tuning Die
items.description: Slip the die into the press to change the frequency of the imprint it leaves behind.

npcs.name: Pressmaster Huun
npcs.auto_greet: Keep your heartbeat steady—the press prefers calm partners.

rooms.title: Submerged Laboratory
rooms.description: Aquarium walls reveal experiments performed in bubbles, with fish wearing monocles taking notes. Mechanical quills drift like seaweed, scribbling formulas in waterproof ink.

items.name: Bubble Torch
items.description: Ignite it underwater to cast a dry bubble around delicate equipment.

rooms.title: Pressure Lounge
rooms.description: Padded alcoves provide respite for divers acclimating to different depths. Brass gauges glow softly as they equalize air and pressure for anyone emerging from the lower labs.

items.name: Depth Bracelet
items.description: Tiny runes adjust to your pulse, warning you when pressure changes too quickly.

rooms.title: Volcanic Forge
rooms.description: Anvils glow a gentle cherry red while sparks sketch blue afterimages in the air. Automated bellows breathe in rhythm with a deep subterranean thrum.

items.name: Molten Crucible
items.description: The crucible remembers the melting point of any metal you pour within.

npcs.name: Forgewright Tessa
npcs.auto_greet: Mind the sparks—they like curious pockets.

rooms.title: Heat Cradle
rooms.description: A suspended iron hammock radiates cozy warmth, perfect for incubating daring ideas. Racks of half-finished prototypes sway gently in the thermal currents.

items.name: Thermal Draft
items.description: A scroll that releases a programmable wave of heat to temper delicate alloys.

rooms.title: Alloy Gallery
rooms.description: Display cases showcase plates of experimental metals, each etched with their unique resonant frequency. Holographic annotations flicker above every sample.

items.name: Alloy Ledger
items.description: A ledger that records the blend of metals used in any item you examine here.

rooms.title: Slag Terrace
rooms.description: Molten slag pours in glittering ribbons into cooling troughs that sculpt themselves into bricks. The terrace overlooks the smoke garden below, its railings hot to the touch.

items.name: Cooling Tongs
items.description: These tongs hum softly when slag has cooled enough to handle safely.

rooms.title: Smoke Garden
rooms.description: Charcoal hedges puff scented rings that drift toward a cavern mouth below. Emberlit lanterns hang from iron trellises, forming constellations of workshop legends.

items.name: Scented Char
items.description: Crush it to release smoke that repels sparks from raw wood or cloth.

rooms.title: Ember Grotto
rooms.description: Ashen stalactites glow from within, breathing out embers that never quite touch the floor. The air tastes faintly of spice and iron.

items.name: Smolder Stone
items.description: A warm stone that reignites banked coals with a gentle squeeze.

rooms.title: Atelier Dormitory
rooms.description: Hammocks stitched from blueprints sway gently, each muttering half-finished inventions in its sleep. Tool lockers double as nightstands, softly glowing when their owners dream of solutions.

items.name: Blueprint Blanket
items.description: Wrap up in it and wake with a rough schematic of whatever you were puzzling over.

rooms.title: Prototype Gallery
rooms.description: A hall of experimental devices spins slowly on suspended turntables. Each prototype projects a short demonstration when approached, eager for field testing.

items.name: Trial Token
items.description: Claiming a token grants temporary access to test any prototype in the gallery.

rooms.title: Inventors' Forum
rooms.description: Tiered seating surrounds a central dais where engineers pitch their boldest plans. Debate sigils flare gently, ensuring every voice is heard in orderly rotation.

items.name: Debate Stylus
items.description: Touch it to the dais and your idea becomes a shimmering schematic for all to inspect.

npcs.name: Moderator Fex
npcs.auto_greet: Present your case succinctly—the queue of bright minds is never short.

rooms.title: Windborne Loft
rooms.description: Gauzy curtains billow inward, revealing a balcony stocked with spare wings and parachutes. Draft charts line the walls, mapping the safest glide paths between districts.

items.name: Glider Rig
items.description: Folded canvas wings that deploy with a tug, perfect for short descents.

rooms.title: Wind Tuning Tunnel
rooms.description: Pipes shift diameter with each step, harmonizing breezes into melodies of encouragement. Panels along the wall slide open to test airflow on delicate inventions.

items.name: Resonant Vane
items.description: Attach it to a prototype and it sings when airflow hits an optimal balance.

rooms.title: Aerial Dynamics Lab
rooms.description: Suspended platforms rise and fall on controlled gusts while tethered gliders practice delicate maneuvers. Charts of prevailing winds cascade down a central column.

items.name: Stabilizer Ribbon
items.description: Tie it to a wing edge to automatically counterbalance turbulence.
